comments.body: Fixed for 5.0 and 5.5.  Thanks for reporting this issue.

description:
The last sentence of the second paragraph of the section titled "General Tips on Running SSL"
contains a typo:

  "...  take the appropriate action *of* https is not  specified."

should read 

  "...  take the appropriate action *if* https is not  specified."

(The emphasis is mine.)

The same typo occurs in the Tomcat 4.0 docs (the sentences are exactly the same).
Hence, this report is relevant to 

  http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-4.0-doc/ssl-howto.html

as well.
